sources.title: Undercover Agent (1939) Crime, Drama Classic Movie
sources.description:
The Most HUNTED Man in the World!
 A railway postal clerk goes after a sweepstakes counterfeiting ring.

Director: Howard Bretherton
Writers: Milton Raison , Martin Mooney
Stars: Russell Gleason, Shirley Deane, J.M. Kerrigan 
Genres: Drama, Crime, Noir

@CCC socials:
https://www.facebook.com/CultCinemaClassics 
https://www.instagram.com/cultcinemaclassics
https://www.twitch.tv/cultcinema

metadata.Plot: When Bill Trent (Russell Gleason),a United States Mail Inspector for the railways, uses his gun to foil a robber, he gets a probation sentence from the service. So, the next time he encounters a gang of crooks---forgers of sweepstakes tickets---he brings them to justice and jail without the aid of a gun.
metadata.Actors: Russell Gleason, Shirley Deane, J.M. Kerrigan
